remarks: A condition for required for proof of Lemma A in [Crawley] p. 112. (Contributed by NM, 29-Apr-2012.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
cdlema1.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
cdlema1.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
cdlema1.j $e |- .\/ = ( join ` K ) $.
cdlema1.m $e |- ./\ = ( meet ` K ) $.
cdlema1.a $e |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) $.
cdlema1.n $e |- N = ( Lines ` K ) $.
cdlema1.f $e |- F = ( pmap ` K ) $.
cdlema1N $p |- ( ( ( K e. HL /\ X e. B /\ Y e. B ) /\ ( P e. A /\ Q e. A /\ R e. A ) /\ ( ( R =/= P /\ R .<_ ( P .\/ Q ) ) /\ ( P .<_ X /\ Q .<_ Y ) /\ ( ( F ` Y ) e. N /\ ( X ./\ Y ) e. A /\ -. Q .<_ X ) ) ) -> ( X .\/ R ) = ( X .\/ Y ) ) $.
